title: Balkan Computer Congress - BalCCon2k20
abstract: Balkan Computer Congress is an annual three days gathering of the international hacker community in the organization of LUGoNS
description:
Our goal is to gather all the communities from the region and abroad so we can socialize, hack, play, learn, exchange knowledge and experience and of course, party together.
BalCCon is community organized and non commercial event - from Hackers to Hackers. We are aiming to become the center of the hacker community in the region as well as to provide an opportunity for all the people in this part of Europe to connect and to cooperate.
